targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback	>= 2.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5) and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI' and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
      r.nombre as "MINISTERIO E INSTITUCCIÓN", 
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
			sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO",
		  CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end) as "PROMEDIO",
      sum(CASE WHEN (a.feedback is null and a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SIN VALORACIÓN Y CONFIRMADO",
      count(*) AS "TOTAL ATENDIDO"
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)
			--AND b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,453,553,561,597,563,566,354,503,599)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio)
			and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
			group by r.nombre ORDER BY "MUY SATISFECHO" desc

panels.title: INDICE DE SATISFACCIÓN MINISTERIO E INSTITUCCIÓN ($ministerio)
INDICE DE SATISFACCIÓN MINISTERIO E INSTITUCCIÓN

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5	AND a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 2.5	AND a.feedback >= 1.5	and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5	AND a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 2.5	AND a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
      --ROW_NUMBER (),
      r.nombre as "GOBERNACIÓN", 
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
			sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO",
		  CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end) as "PROMEDIO",
      sum(CASE WHEN (a.feedback is null and a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SIN VALORACIÓN Y CONFIRMADO",
      count(*) AS "TOTAL ATENDIDO"
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			where 
			$__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1
			and r.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')	
			group by r.nombre ORDER BY "MUY SATISFECHO" desc

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 3.5 AND  a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 2.5 AND a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
                                      			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI')
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
				and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 3.5 AND  a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 2.5 AND a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) AND a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.principal is true 
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		  and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
      --ROW_NUMBER (),
      r.nombre || ' (' || es.nombre || ')' as "GOBERNACIÓN", 
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
			sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO",
      CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end) as "PROMEDIO",
      sum(CASE WHEN (a.feedback is null and a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SIN VALORACIÓN Y CONFIRMADO",
      count(*) AS "TOTAL ATENDIDO"
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.resolutorio rr on rr.id_estado = r.id_estado
			inner join gestion.estado es on es.id = r.id_estado
			where 
			$__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2
			and rr.nombre in ($gobernaciones) and b.principal is true 
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		  and (a.feedback >= 2.5 or  a.verificado = 'SI')
			group by r.nombre, es.nombre ORDER BY "MUY SATISFECHO" desc

SELECT nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio
	where id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
